title: CoverAI: AI Cover Letter Maker
description:
Struggling with job applications? Don't let a generic cover letter hold you back! CoverAI is your AI-powered assistant for crafting compelling, tailored cover letters that get you noticed.

Key Features:
🚀 Instant Generation: Create professional cover letters in seconds
🎯 Company-Specific Tailoring: Customized content based on hiring company information
📄 Resume Integration: Easily import your profile from your resume
🔗 Job Posting Analysis: Extract key info directly from job links
